title: Savings clause
context: ยง490:9-802 Savings clause. (a) Except as otherwise provided in this part, this part applies to a transaction or lien within its scope, even if the transaction or lien was entered into or created before July 1, 2013. (b) This part does not affect an action, case, or proceeding commenced before July 1, 2013. [L 2012, c 33, pt of ยง1]
